rationale: The segment contains 'highly pathogenic', but this is a technical term and not an authorial intensifier on a general risk-adjective.
statement_text: Romania has reported a new outbreak of highly pathogenic H5N1 avian influenza, commonly called bird flu, on a farm in the south of the country, the World Organisation for Animal Health (OIE) said on Monday.
